seniority_level.evidence: Job title does not include seniority indicator and no years of experience are specified.

job_family.evidence: Title is "Data Engineer-Data Integration" and responsibilities focus on data pipelines, warehousing and integration.

sub_specialty.evidence: Responsibilities mention batch processing and ETL tool Informatica PowerCenter; no specific streaming technologies are listed.

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people‑management, team lead or mentorship responsibilities; role is described as an individual contributor.

secondary_clouds.evidence: No other cloud providers are mentioned in the posting.

processing_paradigm.evidence: Description states work on both "batch and real‑time processing".

orchestrator_category.evidence: No orchestration tools (Airflow, Luigi, etc.) are referenced.

storage_layer.evidence: Key skill "Data warehousing" is listed; no explicit data lake technologies are cited.

remote_restriction.evidence: Location is specified as Navi Mumbai, India with no remote‑work language; geo restriction type is "specific_countries" (IN).

timezone_focus.evidence: Job is based in India, which falls in the APAC time zone region.

relocation_required.evidence: Posting does not mention relocation assistance or a requirement to move.

h1b_friendly.evidence: No statement about H‑1B sponsorship; posting is for an Indian location where H‑1B is not applicable.

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: No mention of OPT/CPT or student‑visa eligibility.

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship or work‑authorization restrictions are described.

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Employment type and contract model are not specified in the posting.

benefits_level.evidence: Benefits array is empty and no perks are described.

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Posting does not discuss career ladders, promotion tracks, or growth opportunities.

mentorship_signals.evidence: No reference to mentorship programs or senior‑engineer guidance.

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No language about promotion, advancement, or career progression appears.

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers or lateral moves within IBM.

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career track options (IC, management, specialist, architect) are described.

requirement_strictness.evidence: A clear list of required hard skills is provided with no nice‑to‑have items, indicating a balanced requirement set.

scope_definition.evidence: Job description focuses specifically on data engineering tasks without blending other roles.

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Required skill set (ETL, cloud, SQL, Python, Big Data) aligns with typical expectations for a data engineer; no excessive senior‑level demands are present.
